key: \C[30]Mrs. Adeera\C[0]
original: \C[30]Mrs. Adeera\C[0]

key: Look like I forgot it at home again, please come back later.
original: Look like I forgot it at home again, please come back later.
translation: 我应该是忘在家里了，你下次再来吧

key: What are you doing here? I'm busier than it looks.
original: What are you doing here? I'm busier than it looks.
translation: 你有什么事吗？我正忙着呢

key: Me
original: Me

key: Hmm...
original: Hmm...

key: Holy shit!
original: Holy shit!

key: Is that a horse dong?
original: Is that a horse dong?

key: ... Probably smaller than mine tho.
original: ... Probably smaller than mine tho.

key: Closer
original: Closer

key: Man! It's so cool. I've never seen someone doing something like this before.
original: Man! It's so cool. I've never seen someone doing something like this before.
translation: 老天！看上去好帅。我还从没见过有人这样玩的

key: Next
original: Next

key: How can someone orgasmed when do it with thier butthole?
original: How can someone orgasmed when do it with thier butthole?
translation: 怎么会有人用后面的洞高潮的？

key: You again!
original: You again!

key: Crap! She saw me.
original: Crap! She saw me.

key: Come in.
original: Come in.

key: He-he.
original: He-he.

key: Take a sit.
original: Take a sit.

key: That's where the guest sits. Come and sit in my chair.
original: That's where the guest sits. Come and sit in my chair.
translation: 不是那里，过来坐我的椅子上

key: I feel more comfortable sitting here.
original: I feel more comfortable sitting here.

key: ... Alright.
original: ... Alright.

key: Man! She's so scary,
original: Man! She's so scary,

key: *Gulp*
original: *Gulp*

key: Why are you still standing there? I don't have all day.
original: Why are you still standing there? I don't have all day.
translation: 你还站在这儿干嘛？我可没空陪你玩

key: Sorry! I'm tying my shoelaces.
original: Sorry! I'm tying my shoelaces.

key: I should keep going.
original: I should keep going.

key: So comfortable. I can sit on this all day.
original: So comfortable. I can sit on this all day.
translation: 真舒服，我能光在这儿坐着坐一整天

key: She's coming. What should I do? I'm so nervous.
original: She's coming. What should I do? I'm so nervous.
translation: 她过来了，我该做什么？我好紧张

key: What a view. I never bore watching woman crosses their legs.
original: What a view. I never bore watching woman crosses their legs.
translation: 这视角真不错，我永远看不腻女人跷二郎腿

key: So. Did you enjoy my performance?
original: So. Did you enjoy my performance?
translation: 那么，你喜欢看我刚才做的事吗？

key: I don't know what you're talking about? I'm just here second ago and I didn't see anything.
original: I don't know what you're talking about? I'm just here second ago and I didn't see anything.
translation: 你在说什么？我刚刚才到这儿，什么都没看见

key: Lying is a bad habit but I certainly sure your down here pretty enjoyed my performance. Huh?
original: Lying is a bad habit but I certainly sure your down here pretty enjoyed my performance. Huh?
translation: 说谎可不是坏习惯，我很确定你喜欢看哦，对吧？

key: Let's see how it looks under this curtain. It's been a big tent since you got in here.
original: Let's see how it looks under this curtain. It's been a big tent since you got in here.
translation: 来看看这帐篷下藏着什么东西，从你进来开始你这里就一直立着了

key: Wait. What are you doing?
original: Wait. What are you doing?

key: I never thought it would be this big.
original: I never thought it would be this big.
translation: 我还真没想到会这么大

key: \C[30]Mrs. Adeera\C[0], I feel like there is something wrong. Didn't I'm here to sign or something?
original: \C[30]Mrs. Adeera\C[0], I feel like there is something wrong. Didn't I'm here to sign or something?
translation:
\C[30]阿黛拉女士\C[0]，是不是有哪里不对？
我不应该是来这儿签字报道之类的吗？

key: Huh? So, instead of knocking the door and wait for respond. You choose to take a peek on people persional life?
original: Huh? So, instead of knocking the door and wait for respond. You choose to take a peek on people persional life?
translation: 哈？这就是你不敲门等回应而是偷窥我隐私的原因？

key: I didn't mean....
original: I didn't mean....

key: Put that aside.
original: Put that aside.

key: You enjoyed your time, now its my turn to enjoy mine.
original: You enjoyed your time, now its my turn to enjoy mine.
translation: 你刚才看得挺爽，现在该让我爽一爽了

key: It's twittching so much. Is my foot makes you feel that good?
original: It's twittching so much. Is my foot makes you feel that good?
translation: 它抖得好厉害，我的脚让你那么舒服吗？

key: You let out a lot. It's all over my feet now.
original: You let out a lot. It's all over my feet now.
translation: 你射出来好多，弄得我满脚都是

key: Now get into the main part. Did you know how serious for what you did?
original: Now get into the main part. Did you know how serious for what you did?
translation: 现在该进入正题了，你知道你刚才所做的一切有多严重吗？

key: As this school president, I can play some little trick that can put the rest of your life into mud.
original: As this school president, I can play some little trick that can put the rest of your life into mud.
translation: 作为校长，我完全有能力让你的下半辈子都陷入泥潭里。

key: It's can't be that serious, right?
original: It's can't be that serious, right?

key: You can try.
original: You can try.

key: Oh crap!
original: Oh crap!

key: But I'm not that petty.
original: But I'm not that petty.

key: *Phew*
original: *Phew*

key: Lately there have been a lot of people complaining about the broken plank on the floor.
original: Lately there have been a lot of people complaining about the broken plank on the floor.
translation: 之前有许多人抱怨过有地板破了个洞

key: It's on the 2nd floor on the way to teachers offices corridor. Now go and fix it.
original: It's on the 2nd floor on the way to teachers offices corridor. Now go and fix it.
translation: 我记得是在二楼楼梯口的位置，现在去把它修好

key: What!? You run a big business and you demand a small student like me to do those kind of works.
original: What!? You run a big business and you demand a small student like me to do those kind of works.
translation: 什么？！你搞这么多就是为了让我这样的学生仔去干这种事？

key: You dare speak to me in that tone of voice?
original: You dare speak to me in that tone of voice?

key: W-What are you doing?
original: W-What are you doing?

key: Eek!!!
original: Eek!!!

key: S-Stop. You gonna tear it off.
original: S-Stop. You gonna tear it off.
translation: 别-别这样，你会把它扭断的

key: Fix or not?
original: Fix or not?

key: Okay, okay. I will do it.
original: Okay, okay. I will do it.

key: It would be better to submit into your position.
original: It would be better to submit into your position.
translation: 你最好搞清楚你的位置

key: I found your profile. Please sign in these terms.
original: I found your profile. Please sign in these terms.
translation: 我找到你的档案了，来在这里签字

key: Okay.
original: Okay.

key: I'm surprised to see you read them.
original: I'm surprised to see you read them.
translation: 我还挺惊讶你竟然会认真读一遍

key: You need to sign in this one too.
original: You need to sign in this one too.

key: Why there are so many.
original: Why there are so many.
translation: 怎么有这么多要签字的

key: This one too.
original: This one too.

key: Not reading anymore?
original: Not reading anymore?

key: You need do finger print on this one with your singature.
original: You need do finger print on this one with your singature.
translation: 还有这个，要你按个指纹

key: Okay, okay.
original: Okay, okay.

key: You good to go now.
original: You good to go now.

key: I will call you if I need you to do something for me.
original: I will call you if I need you to do something for me.
translation: 我有需要的时候会叫你做事的

key: Wait what? Aren't we already make a deal? You forgive me for this if I repair the broken floor?
original: Wait what? Aren't we already make a deal? You forgive me for this if I repair the broken floor?
translation: 什么？我们不是一笔两清了吗？你说只要我修好地板就行的？

key: Hmm... What is that? Isn't that just my attedance form.
original: Hmm... What is that? Isn't that just my attedance form.
translation: 嗯...这是什么？这-这不是我的出勤表吗？

key: Tsk-tsk.
original: Tsk-tsk.

key: It's a contract between me and you that you already sign and finger print.
original: It's a contract between me and you that you already sign and finger print.
translation: 这是一份你我之间的合约，而且你已经签字画押了

key: In 3 years, you will do for whatever I say.
original: In 3 years, you will do for whatever I say.
translation: 在接下来三年里，我让你做什么你就要做什么

key: What? You were playing scam.
original: What? You were playing scam.

key: Welcome to the adult world.
original: Welcome to the adult world.
translation: 欢迎来到成年人的世界

key: Sooooo, you have to do everything I say for 3 years. If you breach the contract, you will be fined a certain amount.
original: Sooooo, you have to do everything I say for 3 years. If you breach the contract, you will be fined a certain amount.
translation:
所以，在接下来三年里，我让你做什么你就要做什么
如果你违反合约，那么会被罚一大笔钱

key: You have to pay more than you can imagine.
original: You have to pay more than you can imagine.
translation: 相信我，你会赔很多钱的

key: Fine...
original: Fine...

key: How naive.
original: How naive.

key: Just think wider, I will not provide any request that will harm you. On the other hands, my reward will be much more surprising.
original: Just think wider, I will not provide any request that will harm you. On the other hands, my reward will be much more surprising.
translation: 你先别担心，我不会让你做坏事的，而且另一方面，我会给你奖励的

key: Alright, enough talking. Go and do your first task.
original: Alright, enough talking. Go and do your first task.
translation: 好了，说了这么多，现在去完成我给你的第一个任务吧

key: I don't have any tool to fix it.
original: I don't have any tool to fix it.

key: Ask \C[4]Susan\C[0], she knows where those things are.
original: Ask \C[4]Susan\C[0], she knows where those things are.
translation: 去找\C[4]苏珊\C[0]，她知道工具放在哪

key: I forgot that you are a new transfer student.
original: I forgot that you are a new transfer student.
translation: 我忘了你是新来的转学生了

key: She's usualy in my persional toilet to do the cleasing work. You can find her there in the morning.
original: She's usualy in my persional toilet to do the cleasing work. You can find her there in the morning.
translation: 她一般在我的私人卫生间里做清洁工作，你早上去找她就行

key: Do you mean the restroom next to this room.
original: Do you mean the restroom next to this room.
translation: 你是说隔壁的卫生间吗

key: I hate when you use the look of superiority on me. Now get out of here before I put my force on you.
original: I hate when you use the look of superiority on me. Now get out of here before I put my force on you.
translation: 别用那种眼神看我，现在你该出去了

key: \C[30]Mrs. Adeera\C[0]: \v[85]
original: \C[30]Mrs. Adeera\C[0]: \v[85]

key: Well, I should go and look for \C[4]Ms. Susan\C[0].
original: Well, I should go and look for \C[4]Ms. Susan\C[0].
translation: 行吧，现在我该去找\C[4]苏珊小姐\C[0]了

key: She will be in that restroom over there in the morning.
original: She will be in that restroom over there in the morning.
translation: 她早上会在这边的卫生间里

key: You receive a "\c[1]Fix the Broken Plank\c[0]" quest from \C[30]Mrs. Adeera\C[0].
original: You receive a "\c[1]Fix the Broken Plank\c[0]" quest from \C[30]Mrs. Adeera\C[0].
translation: 你从\C[30]阿黛拉女士\C[0]那里接受了"\c[1]修地板\c[0]"任务

key: You can quickly view the Quest log by Press "\c[1]A\c[0]" key.
original: You can quickly view the Quest log by Press "\c[1]A\c[0]" key.
translation: 你可以按"\C[1]A\C[0]"键浏览任务日志

key: Double click on the Quest to track it. Which mean, it will appear each time you view the quest log.
original: Double click on the Quest to track it. Which mean, it will appear each time you view the quest log.
translation: 双击任务以持续追踪任务进度

key: Leave
original: Leave

key: Hmm... Where is the dude at?
original: Hmm... Where is the dude at?

key: There's no one in the closet.
original: There's no one in the closet.

key: There's nothing outside the windows also.
original: There's nothing outside the windows also.

key: Pardon.
original: Pardon.

key: What are you doing in my office? Aren't you here for something?
original: What are you doing in my office? Aren't you here for something?
translation: 你在我办公室里找什么呢？

key: I'm looking for the principal to report my attendance. Can you help me call him?
original: I'm looking for the principal to report my attendance. Can you help me call him?
translation: 我来找校长报到，能麻烦你叫一下他吗？

key: I'm that principal that you're looking for.
original: I'm that principal that you're looking for.

key: I'm really sorry.
original: I'm really sorry.

key: Maybe I left your documents at home.
original: Maybe I left your documents at home.
translation: 我大概把你的档案忘在家里了

key: How clumsy me.
original: How clumsy me.

key: Please come back later.
original: Please come back later.

key: I'll come back next time then.
original: I'll come back next time then.

key: That strange smell is still here.
original: That strange smell is still here.

key: I noticed there's a weird stain on the carpet.
original: I noticed there's a weird stain on the carpet.
translation: 地毯上有些奇怪的污渍

key: Maybe she is still mad at me because I interrupted her.
original: Maybe she is still mad at me because I interrupted her.
translation: 可能她被我打扰到了，正在气头上呢

key: I wonder what she did before that. Maybe I should peek next time when I hear her moan.
original: I wonder what she did before that. Maybe I should peek next time when I hear her moan.
translation: 我挺好奇她之前在干什么，等下次听到她娇喘的时候我偷看一眼

key: So flashy...
original: So flashy...

key: Documents and stuff...
original: Documents and stuff...
